Hi everyone.

I am looking into access/refresh tokens lifespan, the documentation mentions that the access token is 1800s (30min) long, but nothing is said about that of the refresh token, except that it's "long-lived".

Old forms say that refresh tokens never expire, but I am not sure if that is still the case. Could someone please confirm this?
might you have any reference that's not 5 years old haha
No I don't, I just know that none of mine have ever expired.  Of course I have only been building apps for around 3 years so I guess I'll be surprised if and when they ever do.
that's as solid a reference as I need. Thank you Scott!
